image.caption: Collection of the U.S. House of Representatives

profileText: a Representative from New York; born in Elmira, Chemung County, N.Y., February 10, 1983; graduated from Corning-Painted Post West High School, Corning, N.Y., 2001; B.A., Georgetown University, Washington, D.C., 2005; attended, Yale University, New Haven, Conn., 2009; staff, Archbishop Walsh Academy, Olean, NY; consultant; campaign manager; staff, United States Representative Thomas W. Reed II, 2010-2017; staff, New York state representative Joseph Giglio, 2022; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Seventeenth Congress, by special election, to fill the vacancy caused by the resignation of United States Representative Thomas W. Reed II (August 23, 2022-January 3, 2023); was not a candidate for reelection to the One Hundred Eighteenth Congress in 2022.
